comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050315-1100

If you select outside of a project element (in the xml header for instance) when
the occurrence hilighter is turned on a null pointer exception is thrown. 
AntModel.getNode will return null if the offset is not inside the project node
range.
